articles.title: Trump Hands Putin Win With Retreat From Ukraine Peace Talks - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- Eleven days ago, European leaders took heart when President Donald Trump called for a 30-day ceasefire in Ukraine and threatened new sanctions...
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Eleven days ago, European leaders took heart when President Donald Trump called for a 30-day ceasefire in Ukraine and threatened new sanctions on Russia. A telephone call with Vladimir… [+7101 chars]
